task.title: Configure an overview report
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to configure and edit an overview (landing) report.

context.p: The marketing reports and analytics landing page is a dynamically generated report called the Site Overview report. It displays high-level metrics and page-level data relevant to your report suite. You can edit the Overview report's layout, set it as a dashboard, and drill into the data.

info.p: If you do not have a dashboard set as your landing page, the Site Overview report displays.

step.cmd: Use the following features, as required:

choices.choice: My Reports: Toggles the reports menu in the left navigation.
Show Segments: Brings up the list of segments you can apply. Lets you access the segment builder and the segment manager.
Save As: Lets you save the report with a name that you choose.
Download: Creates a PDF that you can open or save.

More: Print creates a print view of the report that you can send to a printer. Rename lets you create a custom report by renaming the current one. In addition, you can create a print preview, view the archive, and set this page as the landing page.
